author: marioevz
content:
Hi all, the latest hive update to the Cancun Engine API tests for devnet-9 has been merged to master: https://github.com/ethereum/hive/pull/840 and https://github.com/ethereum/hive/pull/839
It contains the updated beacon root contract (`0xbEac00dDB15f3B6d645C48263dC93862413A222D`), as well as updated tests from the Engine API suite running on Cancun and using Blob transactions everywhere, so there is an increase in the number of tests in the `engine-cancun` suite from 55 to 216 tests.
We will be updating hivecancun page in the coming days, along with the new EVM tests from execution-spec-tests, in the meantime please use the following command on hive master branch to run the entire suite locally:
```
./hive --client-file ./configs/cancun.yaml --client <client name> --sim ethereum/engine --sim.limit "engine-cancun/" --docker.nocache <client name>
```
If there are any issues please let me or <@755913785620824175> know and we can help out with triaging of any issue, or also if you need to update the docker image in https://github.com/ethereum/hive/blob/master/configs/cancun.yaml

cc <@543900561460822016> <@758579010027782144> <@508125616940515329> <@827653956955406406> <@583892532644151312>

author: m.kalinin
content: Although, there isn't a strict order of the checks enforced by the spec, the spec states "This validation MUST be instantly run in all cases even during active sync process." which makes the client to respond instantly if versionedHashes does not match the expected ones
